1.content:
"Master"

"Master"

Papi yelled

Miia slithered alongside Kimihito on what was supposed to be a date. However, Papi had ended up coming with them. Darling just couldn't say no to them.

As she hung on him in their usual hijinx. Miia looked at them, anger in her eyes.

"This was supposed to be my day with darling. Why did you have to come along. I knew him first he's mine." She thought to herself.

Miia couldn't get the thought out of her head.

"That annoying little harpy is always getting in my way, I wish she would just disappear" Miia thought to herself

Miia, Papi, and Kimihito walked in.

They had left the TV on and there was a documentary playing. It was a national geographic show about constrictor snakes in the wild. They showed as an anaconda wrapped around a chicken and crushed it before swallowing it whole.

Miia had an idea. She was a Lamia, a snake, the natural predator of annoying birds like Papi, if Papi disappeared then they would assume she just flew away in the night.

She would do it tonight. Darling was going to be away, he was going to see family tonight.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
"See ya" Kimihito said as he left. He would he be gone for a week, it was Wednesday. He was going to see family.

He had cooked dinner. Miia hadn't eaten anything, she would eat later tonight.

"I'm going to bed" Miia said

"This early?" Centoria said

"Ya I'm tired"

"Well good night then"

Miia slithered off into her bedroom and waited.

The hours passed. As the moon rose Miia was sure she was the only one awake. She slithered out of her room and through the hall. She opened Papi's door and slithered up to her bed. Papi was layer out without any blankets covering her.

Miia slowely wrapped coils of her snake body around Papi.

Papi wouke up and saw Miia wrapped around her.

"Miia what are yo-"

Papi was interrupted as Miia constricted her coils. The coils slid against each other applying pressure.

"Papi did you know Anacondas can crush with 90 psi of force. That's enough to crush the heart of their victims, and snap bones. They also love to eat birds. However I'm not an anaconda. I can crush metal pipes using my tail, meaning I have a closer to 10,000 psi maximum force."

Miia whispered constricting tighter.

Papi tried to escape but it was useless, Miia's snake body was solid muscle and the scales proteced her from and claws.

"I'm not even squeezing that hard yet, you ready?" Miia taunted

Papi tried to speak but there was no sir in her lungs to do it.

Miia's coils started moving again. Squeezing tighter and tighter.

crack

crack

crack

Miia felt Papi's bones snap in her coils. She constricted even more.

CRACK

The pressure was to much for Papi's fragile avian bones and her ribcage collapsed.

"Oh already, you're weaker then I thought"

Papi lost consciousness as Miia squeezed the life out of her. Papi fell limp.

"Well time for dinner, itadakimasu "

Miia unhinged her jaw, another serpentine ability.

She started with Papi's feet, as they slid down her throat Miia giggled thinking of how easy that was. Papi slid down Miia's throat, and as Miia's lips went around her ass she kept pulling Papi in deeper and deeper.

Miia felt Papi's flat chest go past her lips and the head. Finally Papi's wings bent at unnatural angles. She bones inside shattered by Miia's powerful grasp.

Miia felt Papi slide down her throat into her serpentine stomach.

Miia felt Papi move into her long snake stomach. Miia picked up the feathers that had fallen and threw them out the window, leaving it open.

Miia went back to bed, a large lump in her lower body.

When Miia woke up in the morning the lump wasn't firm anymore. It had elongated and become soft. The enzimes her stomach produced were breaking down Papi.

Miia went down to breakfast. She didn't eat anything, she was quite full.

"Not eating anything, Miia" Centoria said.

"I already ate before you all woke up" Miia respond

"Has anyone seen Papi? She's missing and her widow was open" Mero said

Miia giggled

"What, do you know something"

"No, she probably just went out to do something."

"Well I guess. But I'm still worried. She might be in danger, she's a bird and could get hurt easily"

"Oh you have no idea" Miia thought to herself, as she felt a contraction push Papi a little farther down.

Mero stared at the bulge in Miia's tail.

"Miia, ...... no nevermind" Mero said

Miia couldn't think of who to eat next.
11.title: Lamia VS Harpy

111.content:
Miia saw Mero looking at the bulge in her tail that was once Papi. They looked up and locked eyes.

"Mero has to go next." Miia thought to herself

Another contraction pushed Papi into Miia's intestine to be stripped of nutrients.

After breakfast everyone went their separate ways. Miia stealthy followed Mero.

Mero got out of her chair and into her tank.

Miia snuck up to Mero's room. She slithered in. Mero saw her.

"Miia, why are you here?"

"Do I need to spell it out for you. I saw you eyeing my tail earlier"

"So it is true, thats Papi isn't it."

"Yep, she didn't last long"

"WHY, ... why would you kill her"

"She was an obstacle"

Miia darted at Mero. Who was just barely able to Dodge. Miia struck again, Mero was too slow. Miia wrapped her coils of death around the helpless mermaid.

"I could crush you, but this'll be more fun. "

Miia pulled Mero out of the water and started swallowing her starting with Mero's Tail. Miia wrapped a coil around Mero's throat to stop her from screaming and pushed Mero into her throat. Miia unhinged her law and started pulling Mero in. Mero struggled but couldn't put up a fight against Miia's iron grip. Miia pushed past Mero's ass. Then Mero's chest, she squeezed Mero's chest into her throat and with one last gulp swlllowed Mero alive

Miia looked down at the squirming lump in her tail. Mero screamed for help, but it was muffled.

The the door swung open standing there looking at Miia was.
111.title: Mero meets her maker

1112.content:
Rachne stated at Miia.

"Is that Mero. Did you just eat Mero?!"

Miia wasted no time striking at Rachne without warning.

Miia wrapped coils around Rachne.

"You're just another obstacle like them"

"THEM, you ate Papi too?!?!"

Rachne could see Mero struggling as she was actually pressed up to Rachel's ear.

"HELLLLPPPPP PLEASE I DON'T WANT TO DIE LIKE THIS"

Miia forced Meri deeper down. Near where Rachnes body went from human to spider.

The walls tightned around Mero as Miia squeezed Rachne.


"You can't hurt me, my exoskeleton is like armor"

"You still have a soft upper body and you're underestimating my strength. Snakes are some of the strongest animals." Miia squeezed further.

CRACK

Rachne's exoskeleton collapsed under tons of pressure. Throwing her insides over the room. Her upper body went limp and Miia easily swallowed it down. Miia went to get Suu who cleaned up the remains of Rachne that Miia didn't eat, not knowing she was eating a friend.

Centorea would be here on Friday. So Miia had a few days to digest her meals.

She curled up in the warm humid room to sleep and digest. She could still feel Mero struggling Papi had no form left and was nearing the end of her journey through Miia. Rachne's upper body was a lumo at the top, and in the middle there was a humanoid struggling.

Miia could contract her stomach muscles and easily end Mero. But her struggling felt so good.

Hours passed, Mero slowed down and stopped. Killed by Miia's powerful stomach acid. Keep grew softer and Papi was ready to exit, completely digested, and stripped of nutrients by Miia's predatory digestive tract.
1112.title: Rachne

11121.content:
Days passed and Miia digested her one time friends Rachne and Meru. Merus Royal title didn't seem to protect her flesh from Miia's stomach acid.

The added nutrients allowed Miia to grow longer by around 50%.

knock knock knock

Centorea was finally back. Miia opened the door.

"Where is everyone" Centorea asked

"Oh they're waiting for you. Want to join them" Miia said

"Of course"

"Ok then close your eyes"

"oookkk, just don't try anything funny"

Centorea closed her eyes

Miia wrapped around her in the blink of an eye.

"MIIA WHAT ARE YO-"
Centorea was interrupted by Miia contracting and forcing the air out of her lungs"

Centorea started to struggle. Miia kept an iron grip.

"You'll get to see them now. They're part of me now"

Miia constricted harder. She felt Centorea's legs snap.

Miia used more and more pressure. Centorea struggled against it but couldn't keep up. Miia's serpentine predatory biology was built for this.

Miia felt Centorea's bones shatter I'm her coild but Centorea didn't stop struggling.

Finally Miia went for a killing blow. Miia contracted extremely hard and felt Centorea's bones shatter into dust. Unable to cope with literal tons of pressure.

Centorea went limp, the pressure had collapsed her ribcage, lungs, heart and more. With major arteries popping she suffered extreme internal bleeding and lost consciousness.

Miia kept squeezing, pushed by her animal instincts for upwards of 20 minutes.

Miia unhinged her jaw preparing for her biggest meal yet. Luckily for Miia, Centorea's bones were shattered, meaning she was considerably less rigid. Still Miia slowely swallowed Centorea. Moving from her ass up. Swallowing her horse body's and her breasts. With one final gulp Centorea disappeared, Miia slurped down her hair like a pasta.

Centorea was easily the largest meal so far. Rachne had been mostly splattered and Suu had cleaning her up.

Over the next week Centorea slowly lost definition and grew soft. Moving through Miia's digestive tract and eventually joining the others in the sewer. Miia grew even more, now double her original length.

Miia decided she couldn't really get Suu. She couldn't coil around a geletin and Suu wasn't really a threat.

Later Miia reported them missing. It was investigated as a kidnapping. No one ever discovered what had actually happened.

When Kimihito got home he was crushed by loosing his friends, but grew closer to Miia. When he asked about her increased length she claimed it was a growth spurt. He accepted it, the thought Miia was behind the disappearances never even crossed his mind.

Even when eventually Miia and Kimihito married she never told him about the fate of the other girls.
11121.title: Centorea

info.brief_description: Miia gets fed up with waiting for darling to make his decision
info.description: Miia gets fed up with waiting for darling to make his decision, so she decided to take matters into her own hands. Or in this case mouth.
